view

Class ViewFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • view.ViewFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class ViewFrame
extends javafx.stage.Stage
    Principal class of the package. Manages all the sprite to display Asks all the needed informations to its attribute lvl.
